summary: The Doctor and Clara face their Last Christmas. Trapped on an Arctic base, under attack from terrifying creatures, who are you going to call? Santa Claus!
cast: Peter Capaldi|Jenna Coleman|Nick Frost|Samuel Anderson|Dan Starkey|Nathan McMullen|Faye Marsay|Natalie Gumede|Maureen Beattie|Michael Troughton|Jon Davey|Steven Lathwell
title: Last Christmas
